Name: Golden House
Title: Golden House
Desc: All the contracts that circulate throughout the land are forged here.

Talent.Name: Golden House
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon card or an {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact card with an original cost of at least 3: </color>Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
